messages.message: I get this sort of email daily. Given that the address is a localhost address, I keep getting the error `*127.0.0.1* refused to connect.` when I click on any of the links. Is there a way to know where these emails are coming from and how I can stop these emails? The `to` field of the email wasn't as helpful as it's my original email so it doesn't tell me which org
Yeah, these index-completed emails are designed to be sent to all org admins of the org where the indexed data source is mounted. We need to fix the URL to show the correct domain cc @Jeff
